mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(A.EMP_DRAFTER_ID)
FROM APPROVAL A, APPROVAL_FORM C
WHERE A.FORM_ID = C.FORM_ID AND A.EMP_DRAFTER_ID = #{emp_Drafter_Id}
AND A.APPROVAL_ST IN(4,5)

SELECT APPROVAL_TITLE, APPROVAL_CONTENT, APPROVAL_RECOMMAND_DT, APPROVAL_TERMINATION_DT, APPROVAL_ST, APPROVAL_END_DT, EMP_DRAFTER_ID, DOC_ID, APPROVAL_CANCEL_REASON, APPROVAL_START_DT, APPROVAL_END_DT FROM APPROVAL WHERE DOC_ID = #{doc_Id}

SELECT B.EMP_PICTURE
FROM APPROVAL_HISTORY A, EMP B, APPROVAL C
WHERE A.EMP_ID = B.EMP_ID AND A.DOC_ID = C.DOC_ID AND A.DOC_ID = #{docId}
ORDER BY B.EMP_PICTURE

SELECT B.HISTORY_STEP, B.HISTORY_TURN, B.HISTORY_ST, G.EMP_NAME, B.HISTORY_TYPE, C.CODE_NAME, G.EMP_SIGN, G.EMP_ID
FROM APPROVAL A, APPROVAL_HISTORY B, EMP G, CODE C
WHERE A.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID AND B.DOC_ID = #{doc_Id} AND G.EMP_ID = B.EMP_ID AND G.CODE_ID = C.CODE_ID(+)
GROUP BY B.EMP_ID, B.HISTORY_STEP, B.HISTORY_TURN, B.HISTORY_ST, G.EMP_NAME, B.HISTORY_TYPE, C.CODE_NAME, G.EMP_SIGN, G.EMP_ID
ORDER BY B.HISTORY_STEP ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REFERENCE( EMP_ID, DOC_ID ) VALUES ( #{emp_Id}, #{doc_Id} )
mapper.select:
SELECT A.DOC_ID, E.EMP_ID, E.EMP_NAME, d.dept_name
FROM APPROVAL_HISTORY A , EMP E, dept d
WHERE A.DOC_ID =#{doc_Id} AND A.HISTORY_STEP = 1 AND E.EMP_ID = A.EMP_ID(+) and e.dept_id = d.dept_id(+)

select t.form_id, t.form_name, c.form_name
from approval_form t, approval_form c
where t.form_sup_id = c.form_id
and rownum <= 4

SELECT F.DOC_ID , A.APPROVAL_TITLE , COUNT(D.ATTACH_ID) , A.APPROVAL_RECOMMAND_DT , A.EMP_DRAFTER_ID , C.FORM_NAME , G.EMP_NAME , H.CODE_NAME
FROM APPROVAL A, APPROVAL_HISTORY F , APPROVAL_ATTACH D, APPROVAL_FORM C, EMP G, CODE H
WHERE A.DOC_ID = F.DOC_ID AND A.DOC_ID = D.DOC_ID(+) AND C.FORM_ID = A.FORM_ID AND A.EMP_DRAFTER_ID = G.EMP_ID AND G.CODE_ID = H.CODE_ID AND F.HISTORY_TURN = 'Y' AND F.EMP_ID = #{emp_Drafter_Id}
GROUP BY F.DOC_ID , A.APPROVAL_TITLE , D.ATTACH_ID , A.APPROVAL_RECOMMAND_DT , A.EMP_DRAFTER_ID , C.FORM_NAME , G.EMP_NAME , H.CODE_NAME
ORDER BY A.APPROVAL_RECOMMAND_DT DESC
SELECT APPROVAL_LINE_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS lineId FROM DUAL
SELECT LINE_ID, LINE_NAME FROM APPROVAL_LINE WHERE EMP_ID = #{emp_Id}

select A.EMP_ID, A.LINE_TYPE,B.EMP_NAME, C.DEPT_NAME, D.ATTEND_ST_NAME, E.CODE_NAME
from approval_line_regist A, emp B, DEPT C , ATTEND_ST D ,CODE E
where B.EMP_ID = A.EMP_ID(+) AND C.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID(+) AND B.ATTEND_ST_ID = D.ATTEND_ST_ID(+) AND B.CODE_ID = E.CODE_ID AND A.LINE_ID =#{line_Id}
ORDER BY A.LINE_TYPE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APPROVAL_HISTORY (HISTORY_ST, EMP_ID, DOC_ID, HISTORY_ALLOW_DT, HISTORY_TURN, HISTORY_STEP, HISTORY_TYPE) VALUES( #{history_st} ,#{emp_Id},#{doc_Id} ,current_Date, #{history_Turn}, #{history_Step}, #{history_Type} )

VALUES( #{form_Id}, #{approval_Content}, current_Date, 5, #{emp_Drafter_Id}, APPROVAL_DOC_SEQ.NEXTVAL )
